title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height does not adjust immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a label. 2. Edit the label's font size to be '18 points'.
